description: Kids have too much screen time and not enough autonomy, says author Jonathan Haidt. His book The Anxious Generation argues this has caused an epidemic of mental illness and suggests ways to fix it.
title: How to give kids autonomy? 'Anxious Generation' author says a license to roam helps

description: Eight people were shot including a young girl who was killed in what Chicago police believe was gang-related violence on the city's South Side on Saturday night.
title: Chicago shooting kills 7-year-old girl and wounds 7 people including small children

description: In a year of unprecedented political developments, the New York hush money trial could mean one fewer vote for Donald Trump in Florida.
title: If convicted this year, Trump could lose the right to vote for himself

description: In this swing state, every voting bloc can make a difference. That includes Maricopa County's LDS community, where Republican women have been turning away from former President Donald Trump.
title: These Mormon women are rejecting Trump, fraying GOP support in a key state

description: Former President Donald Trump on Saturday lit into New York prosecutors and the criminal hush money case they brought against him during his last rally before his trial begins Monday.
title: Trump attacks judge and prosecutors in his hush money case in last rally before trial

description: Police have identified the assailant who stabbed six people to death at a busy Sydney shopping center before he was fatally shot by a police officer.
title: Police in Australia identify the Sydney stabbing attacker who killed 6 people

description: House Majority Leader Steve Scalise said the chamber will consider legislation to support Israel after Iran launched dozens of drones toward Israel late Saturday night.
title: House GOP leaders plan to take up Israel aid after Iran attack
